block_comment: This block controls a state machine initialization in response to system's reset input. It operates synchronously with the rising edge of a clock signal ('clk'). On detecting a high signal ('1') on 'reset', it sets 's_i2c_auto_init' to 'AUTO_STATE_0_CHECK_STATUS'; otherwise, it assigns 's_i2c_auto_init' the value of 'ns_i2c_auto_init'.
